snippet: A man was charged with plotting a terrorist spree around Tampa, which included plans to bomb night clubs, destroy bridges and shoot police officers in the name of radical Islam.
abstract: Sami Osmakac is arrested by the Federal Bureau of Investigation and charged with plotting a terrorist spree around Tampa, Florida, with plans to bomb nightclubs, destroy bridges and shoot police officers in the name of radical Islam; authorities have not indicated whether he acted in collaboration with any terrorist group.
lead_paragraph: A man was charged with plotting a terrorist spree around Tampa, which included plans to bomb night clubs, destroy bridges and shoot police officers in the name of radical Islam.

headline.main: Florida Man Charged With Plotting Terror Campaign in Name of Islam
headline.print_headline: Florida Man Charged With Plotting Terror Campaign in Name of Islam
